verse: These are the people who helped rebuild the wall and gates of Jerusalem:

header: Levites Who Worked on the Wall

verse: The Levites who worked on the next sections of the wall were Rehum son of Bani; Hashabiah, who ruled half of the district of Keilah and did this work for his district;
Binnui son of Henadad, who ruled the other half of the district of Keilah;
Ezer son of Jeshua, who ruled Mizpah, rebuilt the section of the wall that was in front of the armory and reached to the corner of the wall;
Baruch son of Zabbai eagerly rebuilt the section of the wall that went all the way to the door of the house of Eliashib the high priest;
Meremoth, son of Uriah and grandson of Hakkoz, built up to the far end of Eliashibâ€™s house.

header: Priests Who Worked on the Wall

verse: Here is a list of the priests who worked on the wall:

header: Other Builders Who Worked on the Wall
